entry.title: Refresh table after execute bound action
entry.content:
i have an RAP app on top of Public Cloud with multiple views (table) which show records with different status on each tab.

I have a bound action to select row/s to update the status. Currently, status is updated but it still sits in the current table.

The expectation is after action is executed, the status of the record will change and the the current view will update making the record disappear in current table and move to another view.

I've tried using side effects but it doesn't work. Is there a way to make the tables refresh after execute of bound action?

  side effects
  {
//tried both but doesnt work
    action updateStatus affects field Status;
    action updateStatus affects $self;
  }

entry.title: Reading child entity in parent entity's determination doesn't work
entry.content:
I am trying to update the total number of items in child entity (Material) in a field in parent entity (Catalogue), however, the read statment returns empty rows for the child entity. How can I fix this, I want to get the count of all the rows in the child entity and update this number in a field in parent entity. Following is the behavior definition and implementation. Thanks.

managed implementation in class zbp_i_catalogue unique;
strict ( 2 );
with draft;

define behavior for zI_catalogue //alias <alias_name>
persistent table zcatalogue
draft table zcatalogue_dr
lock master total etag LastChangedAt
authorization master ( global )
{

  create ( authorization : global );
  update;
  delete;

  field ( readonly, numbering : managed ) CatalogueId;
  field ( readonly ) CategoryDescription, Active, TotalItems, Version,
  CreatedAt, CreatedBy, LastChangedAt, LastChangedBy;

  association _materials { create; with draft; }

  determination saveTotalItems on save { create; }

  draft action Activate optimized;
  draft action Discard;
  draft action Edit;
  draft action Resume;
  draft determine action Prepare;

  mapping for zcatalogue
    {
      CatalogueId         = catalogue_id;
      Name                = name;
      Description         = description;
      Category            = category;
      CategoryDescription = category_description;
      Active              = active;
      TotalItems          = total_items;
      Version             = version;
      ValidFrom           = valid_from;
      ValidTo             = valid_to;
      LastChangedAt       = last_changed_at;
      LastChangedBy       = last_changed_by;
      CreatedBy           = created_by;
      CreatedAt           = created_at;
    }
}

define behavior for zI_material //alias <alias_name>
persistent table zmaterial
draft table zmaterial_dr
lock dependent by _catalogue
authorization dependent by _catalogue
{
  update;
  delete;
  field ( readonly, numbering : managed ) MaterialId;
  field ( readonly ) CatalogueId, CatalogueName, CreatedAt, CreatedBy, LastChangedAt, LastChangedBy;
  
  association _catalogue { with draft; }

  mapping for zmaterial
    {
      MaterialId    = material_id;
      CatalogueId   = catalogue_id;
      CatalogueName = catalogue_name;
      Description   = description;
      Price         = price;
      Currency      = currency;
      Uom           = uom;
      LastChangedAt = last_changed_at;
      LastChangedBy = last_changed_by;
      CreatedBy     = created_by;
      CreatedAt     = created_at;
    }
}
CLASS lhc_zI_catalogue DEFINITION INHERITING FROM cl_abap_behavior_handler.
  PRIVATE SECTION.

    METHODS saveTotalItems FOR DETERMINE ON SAVE
      IMPORTING keys FOR zI_catalogue~saveTotalItems.

ENDCLASS.

CLASS lhc_zI_catalogue IMPLEMENTATION.

  METHOD saveTotalItems.

    READ ENTITIES OF zI_catalogue IN LOCAL MODE
        ENTITY zI_material
        ALL FIELDS WITH VALUE #(
            FOR key IN keys (
                CatalogueId = key-CatalogueId
            )
        )
        RESULT DATA(lt_materials).

    IF lt_materials IS NOT INITIAL.

      MODIFY ENTITIES OF zI_catalogue IN LOCAL MODE
      ENTITY zI_catalogue
      UPDATE FIELDS ( TotalItems )
      WITH VALUE #( FOR _key IN keys ( %tky = _key-%tky TotalItems = lines( lt_materials ) ) ).

    ENDIF.
  ENDMETHOD.

ENDCLASS.

entry.title: Un-select record after executing bound action
entry.content:
I have an RAP app in Public Cloud.

It has a bound action that updates the status of a record. Bound action works fine but those records that are selected for the action still remains selected. This app has multiple views, so those selected/processed records are now on another view but they are still detected by the app as selected. Coz when I try to select another set of records and update the status, it still recognize the previous records which therefore are still selected . 

How can I unselect processed records from an executed bound action?

entry.title: Is there any update on ABAP RAP native capability to model associations between xBO in UI scenarios?
entry.content:
Hi SAP community,

Is there any update on the native ABAP RAP support for xBO navigation and modelling in case of creating Fiori Elements based application using ABAP and CDS annotations without touching the UI5 files in BAS?

In BOPF we had xBO scenarios and we could navigate and do our stuff so, RAP BO should have the same capability. As in many cases customers would like to have that kind of navigation and currently it is possible but w/o native ABAP RAP support. So, if it is there can you share any tutorials or documentation and if not can anyone help understand  if this is in the roadmap?

Best,

Prasenjit Singh Bist

entry.title: How to validate foreign key in internal table by using code?
entry.content: I have a problem with uploading data from excel to an internal table but I want to check that the data in the field I upload must contain data corresponding to that foreign key. Can someone help me how to check that the uploaded data must match the data in the foreign key in the internal table?

entry.title: S/4 Cloud: Is there a way to clear/refresh the metadata cache of a custom service?
entry.content:
Hi community,

is there a way to cleanup/clear/refresh the metadata cache (including annotations) for a custom OData service?

I'm talking about services which are annotated with UI annotations for Fiori Elements apps.

A lot of times when we build RAP services, we add or change annotations to handle requirements. For most of the annotations (like UI.lineItem or UI.selectionField) the changes are immediately active for the generated frontend UI (Fiori Elements). But in some cases the changes are not immediately taking effect. If we then wait a day, it works.

To me it looks like that in such a case the metadata of the service is cached on the backend (nothing related to browser cache) and just takes some time until it gets reset automatically. I know from On-Prem systems, that there are reports for this which are planned as jobs on a daily basis. For S/4 Cloud (Public Cloud) I don't see any option how to trigger a refresh. We sometimes try to unpublish the service and republish it again: this works sometimes, sometimes not.

Our current example is the annotation "hidden" (inside a UI.facet entry): Once activated it took effect. But I deactivated the annotation (took it out completely) and it still affects the generated Fiori Elements app. I'm sure that after 1-2 days the metadata will get refreshed and everything is fine. The issue is, that we cannot be sure if we found a solution for a requirement or not, if we cannot be sure that the changes made, are getting considered or not.

Long story short, I'm wondering if there is anyway to trigger a refresh of the service on S/4 Cloud (I guess an admin app which does something like the report /UI5/UPD_ODATA_METADATA_CACHE on prem).

Thank you
Daniel

entry.title: Schedule RAP Service in BTP Job Scheduler
entry.content:
We have a ABAP cloud system where we have a created a RAP Application. Its a very basic app with a GET operation only.
Our main agenda is to explore the usage of BTP Job scheduler. I am aware that CAPM application can be scheduled easily in Job scheduler.

Kindly let me know if it is possible to schedule RAP Service as a job in Job scheduler. If yes, please help with some working steps for the same.

entry.title: System query option '$count' not supported on expand
entry.content:
Hello,

When I try to use the operation $count into an $expand in an OData V4 call for an SAP  API :

/sap/opu/odata4/sap/api_product/srvd_a2x/sap/product/0001/Product?$expand=_ProductUnitOfMeasure($count=true)

I have the following error : 501 : Not Implemented
System query option '$count' not supported on expand

 

 

For other operation, like "select" for example, it's working well :

/sap/opu/odata4/sap/api_product/srvd_a2x/sap/product/0001/Product?$expand=_ProductUnitOfMeasure($select=QuantityNumerator)

Regarding documentation, "count" seems to be an operation supported by OData : https://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionexpand

Any idea ?

entry.title: Are any RAP BO Reflection APIs available in BTP ABAP environment?
entry.content:
Hello, colleagues. 

Does anyone know any cloud ready reflection API for RAP BO? Are there any plans to make any reflection API for RAP BO?

By the way, class CL_ABAP_BEHVDESCR doesn't have release contract and I can't use it.  Also, the class seems not fully comply with my tasks (read all action for BDEF).

Futhermore, I've tried XCO library, it has quite poor reading capabilities. XCO generation part doesn't give possibility to study existing BDEF at all. Also I've tried classes for abapGIT serialization, I wasn't successful too(not released).

If you know the API, please point out how to get all actions defined in BDEF. 

P.S. It would be great to get something really powerfull to read and parse all BDEF, to get all nodes or all RAP actions or RAP functions etc.

entry.title: Custom Form and Source
entry.content:
I want to create a custom form with a custom data source from Public Cloud.

I already have an ADS ready in BTP and I want to connect the Public Cloud and ADS.

I checked this SAP document to create a communication scenario SAP_COM_0503 but I cannot find it in my system. Turns out that ADS is already integrated in the cloud systems and no longer need communication arrangement (3331902). 

My question is do I just call the render pdf method?

Do I no longer use the BTP ADS service?

How can I assign a custom data source (not a Data Source Extension) to the custom form?

entry.title: UnManaged RAP CDS Odata V4 - JSON array POST method
entry.content:
Hi,

  I have an Unmanaged RAP "Behavior Definition" public on Odatav4 Service Binding:

unmanaged implementation in class <my_class> unique;
strict ( 2 );
define behavior for <my_cds>
lock master
authorization master ( instance )
{
create;
}

In Create Method:

LOOP AT entities ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<fs>).
* my checks
ENDLOOP.

In this example My_Cds have only 2 fields: test (key), description.

POSTMAN test:

When I try to send POST method with JSON Body with single entity work good:

 {
    "test": "001",
     "description": "Hello"
 }
When I try to send array entities like this:
[
   {
     "test": "001",
     "description": "Hello"
   },
   {
      "test": "002",
      "description": "Hello hello"
    }
]
The service response with 400 BadRequest:
 "message": {
            "lang": "en",
            "value": "Error while parsing an XML stream"
        }
 
I don't understand... Is JSON array correct?
On RAP Model, with unmanaged "Behavior Definition", can I send array records in Insert methods or there's a limitation of number of records?
 
Thanks

entry.title: RAP - unable to navigate to grand child object page from child page using ODATA V4
entry.content:
Hi,

I have created a RAP application with Parent-child-grandchild relationship. The application navigates correctly from Parent to child but it fails from child to grandchild when using Odata V4 .I tried with Odata V2 and somehow the navigation from child to grandchild works correctly in OData V2 when previewing from ADT.

Based on the suggestion in blog https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blog-posts-by-members/create-root-child-grandchild-great-grandchild-relationship-using-rap/bc-p/14154316#M174482 i tried adding the grandchild page manually in page map in the BAS but it did not resolve the issue and the below error is thrown during the navigation from child to grandchild:

Log-dbg.js:452 2025-07-16 10:43:16.615800 Cannot read properties of undefined (reading '$target') - TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading '$target') TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading '$target') at Object.V [as getVisibleExpression] (FieldTemplating-dbg.js:495:39) at Object.create (Field.metadata-dbg.js:416:37) at PhantomUtil-dbg.js:470:26

Any inputs or suggestions to resolve the issue?

 

Regards

Radhika

entry.title: CL_ABAP_PARALLEL - Fire and forget scenario with an OData implementation/Any object
entry.content:
Hello Team,

I have a usecase where a expensive process have to be pushed in background using CL_ABAP_PARALLEL.
System: S4hana 2022 onpremise
i used run/ run_inst but it waits for all the work process to finish. I could see "START_INST_IN_BACKGROUND" but i am not sure this will server the purpose.

My OData caller is expecting the response immediately and time consuming process should process in background


Note: we are looking for a released api.. clean core journey it is!!!

Regards,
Vishnu

entry.title: Do not display deleted line item in sap adobe form output using SAP S4 using Gateway service
entry.content:
Hi All,

I am using SAP gateway service to develope SAP ADOBE form using the interface i want to omit the deleted line item in form output.

I am following the below steps to produce form output.

1. Create PO with 3 line items and save it.

2. Delete 1 line item from the PO and approve it using the Front End and corresponding output is generated in which i have omited    the deleted line item so the output contains 2 line items.

3. Now i change the PO after apprval and delete another line item this time for the change po i should get only the recently deleted line item in the Change PO output i.e only 2 line items.

Could you please let me know from which table in SAP S4 could i use to add logic.
